'''In adults'''

1.     Correct or prevent dehydration, giving preference to the oral route whenever possible

2.     Reduce the intensity of diarrhoea

'''In children''': previous item

properties.question: What is the primary goal of symptomatic management of diarrhoea in adults and children?
properties.option_a: Correct or prevent dehydration, giving preference to the oral route whenever possible
properties.option_c: Administer anti-diarrhoeal medications to stop the diarrhoea
properties.option_d: Identify and treat the underlying cause of the diarrhoea
